text: On or after January 1, 2007, this chapter governs a mediation pursuant to a referral or an agreement to mediate, whenever made.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-87, see notes following ยง 16-4201.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon ยง 17 of the Uniform Mediation Act. See 7A, Pt. II, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Application to existing agreements or referrals.
